website_summaries.verdict: Add basketball excitement to your backyard without breaking your budget with this portable hoop.
pros: Very affordable, especially compared to in-ground hoops
44" backboard is able to withstand impact
Not very difficult or time-consuming to set up
cons: Not quite as stable as in-ground or pricier portable models

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. I purchased this for my son’s 11th Birthday and assembled it before his friends showed up for his birthday party. I wouldn’t really call myself a handyman but was able to follow the instructions easily enough. I let my son help assemble it with me which was a good learning experience. He loves it. It’s a great addition to our driveway and provides a lot of fun father son time after school and it’s a good escape from the Xbox with his friends on the weekends. It’s nice and sturdy and has already withstood some strong gusty winds. We filled ours (the base) with water.
customer_reviews.author: Down2theSea

customer_reviews.title: Broken heart on my son. Missing parts,
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get this. I even took the day off of work to wait for this basketball hoop to get here. When it gets here the box is all taped up oddly and disfigured. Nothing of it. When I open the box and laid out all the pieces I noticed it was many pieces missing dented and scratched. It is too heavy for me to return to the store I'm embarrassed of this manufacture I don't know why Amazon deals with these people. Makes you look bad
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Good Outdoor Basketball Hoop
customer_reviews.text: 2 person 2 hr job to put together. Instructions a little difficult to understand and I consider myself fairly handy and able to read and understand instructions. Online videos could have been more exact in what you needed to do. Otherwise great product and has held up well for the 2 months I've had and used it. UPDATE: 4/2017: Still going strong 1+years later. Has held up to the weather. Product is outside 24/7. Still looks good. Would definitely buy again. 4/18 Still looking good. Has held up very well. Awesome purchase. 01.2020: Still outside 24/7 and looking good. No issues...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoopsless
customer_reviews.text: So, got this for my son for Christmas2018. Tried to assemble and couldn't due to imperfections. Call customer service lifetime and gave then all information as required. They allegedly decided to send new parts to replace those that were not good. Its 1/21 haven't received those parts yet. Horrible service from 3rd party. Wouldn't take my chances with brand in future. I dont recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beardless Barbarian

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, no instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts for base and board support. Only 1 side of part as shown in pic. Seems to be like common complaint from other customers as second pic. If this was a known problem then somone should have done some inspection before sending it out to other customers. No customer service till date to provide me missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoop for tween boys
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is sturdy enough. My husband used 6 large bags of sand to fill the base. Arrived on time, not a single part broken. Would purchase again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. When you hit the backboard, which is small, with the ball it rocks and bends, meaning that you don't get a crisp bank shot. Since the backboard works so poorly, encourages the shooter to make a perfect "swish" shot every time. Modern term: nothing but net. Was also difficult to assemble. Nearly impossible to get sand into very small hole provided. Tried using funnels, etc. Factory CSR was no help. Had to cut a larger opening to get the sand into it, then attempt to seal it. Result is only fair. Base is heavy, but also picks up rainwater.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the A this thing has been. Get everything all out of the box to set up and guess what? Not a single piece of hard wear. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Edward fxdb

customer_reviews.title: 1 month and the backboard is completely warped
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of having this outside in southern CA weather from 70-80 degree weather, the backboard is completely warped and it doesn’t appear to be under warranty because this is an “act of nature”. They sold me an “outdoor” basketball system that can’t be used outside. I will not buy this brand’s products again and I will not recommend this brand to anyone. I will only tell people how terrible it is.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappinting. I cant even review its sturdiness, maneuverability or height adjustment because it is too difficult to assemble. It is in pieces in my garage. I hate that i disappointed my so who was looking forward to play with his friends this weekend. Im aware that there was an option for assembly but it was expensive for my budget. I might return it if i can get all the parts back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: John Gacinski

customer_reviews.title: Best investment this summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for keeping my kids entertained in summer. Now we have the kids from the neighborhood and even adults playing and has been a hit for everyone. Is being thought some storms and with just water in the base has managed to stay there. Nothing fancy with this one, but we'll worth it. There are two other basketball courses around my neighborhood walking distance and now my kid don't have to go there all the time and can practice in from of my house. Especially in summer when it gets to 100 degrees he has it close and can take breaks in between.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel G. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty danged good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a portable hoop for our 8 year old. Because of the stay at home orders they were impossible to find. Academy and Dick's Sporting Goods were sold out. Amazon was basically sold out on any name brand hoops. One morning this popped up on Amazon and I speedily added it to the cart and paced my order. Took about one hour to assemble. Is really a nice set up. Perfect for my 8 year old to learn on and I have fun shooting with her. It is well designed and seems like it should be very durable. Good warranty. I am very happy spending $139 on this hoop - seems almost like a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Aton

customer_reviews.title: Transitioning the kids from xbox to Excercise!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grands; they love it! Easy to put together, and the kids actually did it themselves with supervision (7 & 9).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came as it was supposed to come. Instructions were overall good. 2 problems putting it together. The first had to do with the instructions to assemble the base -- most likely it was me, but the instructions could be better. The second is clearly manufacturing-related. Putting the board on the pole... The metal support (the one you bend) did not fit properly (i.e. the holes on the board did not align with the holes on the metal support). Thankfully I am strong and I "MacGyver" them in place. Seems strong/heavy enough to handle wind nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Great height, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great height, easy to put together. My 6 and 4 year old love this and are able to shoot and score at the lowest height (which is still very high). Like some suggested here, we added water to the base. But the very next day, after the boys were playing and stepping on the base, the water started to leak and now we have to use cement blocks to add some weight. I know they probably shouldn't been stepping on it, but for the price I expected a much sturdier material.
customer_reviews.author: RFC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson. This 68 year old grandmother was able to assemble it without help. Instructions were just ok. It helped that we had purchased a similar basketball hoop from a neighbor. Where the instructions were unclear, I was able to check the already assembled unit for visual clarification. Grandson is 6 years old, thrilled with his new hoop and it will adjust as he grows. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this can be assembled by one person, but READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it was a big hit with the grandkids, but assembly took some time and patience. I consider myself fairly handy and I assembled the system by myself (took about 4.5 hours). The instructions took a couple of re-reads for some sections. I suggest you allot enough time for the project. Also rather than fill the base with sand or water which makes the system pretty difficult to move around for me, I just placed 3 (40# each) bags of top soil on the base. Works well and I can move the backboard around, if needed. I did tell the kids no dunking or hanging from the rim!
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Pipes do NOT fit together
customer_reviews.text: The poles that are to move within each other to give height and hold basket in place ~ DO NOT fit together. The site is not allowing me to request a return of our money for a defective item ! Refusing to reimburse for defective item. Contacted Lifetime and they said money needs to come back from seller.
customer_reviews.author: TMS-G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My Son's 13th birthday present. Son absolutely loves it! Frickin pain in the butt to put together though lol be prepared to take couple hours to put it together. 2nd person is helpful. Filled base with sand, used about five 70 lb sandbags total to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size,great price,easy to assemble, grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 8 yro grandson for his birthday, he loves it, its well made and very easy to put together, took his dad 10 minutes to assemble. If you use water to fill base and live in a cold climate add a bit of RV antifreeze so it doesnt freeze causing base to crack from freezing and thawing. Great price and well made.
customer_reviews.author: thumpa2001

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop!
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was rather simple. Instructions were split into sections and bolt and washer packs were labeled to match the section you are assembling. The hoop moves rather easy, we put it in the back yard when not using it. It seems pretty sturdy also. When shooting bank shots, it does move a little but that is gonna be expected since the pole is not mounted into concrete. Overall we are very happy with the setup. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Esly D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money paid
customer_reviews.text: This portable hoop extends to full regulation size yet not too heavy to move around and not too bulky. It does require a strong adult to move around once you feel it with water or sand. Easy assembly is another reason I bought it after hearing stories about other systems. The company is very responsive - the product arrived very fast. I also overtightened a screw and broke the thread - they shipped it right away. The board is not tempered glass / plexiglass, but some form of strong plastic - so don't expect same ball bounce as in a gym. However, for a front yard fun this is just fine for us. Overall, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: O.K.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this hoop for sure!  Great for my 5 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews on this hoop before buying it on a lighting deal and I do not regret buying it at all. It was easy to put apart and I didn't have any issues reading or following the instructions like some of the reviews state. I was able to fill it with water and it doesn't tip over but I will probably buy sand for it once I find a permanent location for it in our yard. I bought this for my 5 year old son and he loves it. I can play with him and don't have to worry about damaging the hoop because the quality is good. I would recommend this hoop for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: Shipped well, easy to put together and use. Only gripe I have with this product is that it takes a lot to raise and lower to adjust the height. But if you're looking to use at a specific height and not move it up and down when trying to role play as an NBA player dunking (albeit an 8 ft height), and just intend to use it a certain height, than this is a good buy. For it's price, it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kawika

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of box, but was able to repair. 8 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Mine showed up with a bent pole end and the base plate had a small crack. Too much of a pain to return, so I reshape the pole end and purchased some sealant goo from a local sporting goods store. My son likes the goal very much at the low height. Assembly was about 30 minutes by myself. The product seems like good value and the damage may have happened in transit. Note that the package look like it hadn't been opened previously. I hope to get get three years out of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: knight

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun and exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I can see how others have complaints and see how some find this awesome from other reviews. To me this has been a awesome product for my son and myself to get some play time and exercise. It goes from 7ft to 10ft. I have pics to show 7ft and 10ft. If you have a ladder you can adjust without having to lay it down on the ground. Very easy to put together and I did it by myself. If you have the right bracing equipment (strong sturdy tables or benches for bracing) you can do it. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Strange

customer_reviews.title: C quality, F on providing all parts
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is what you expect for the (approx) $80 we paid for it. Purchased for my 1st grader and Kindergartener to practice in the driveway; didn’t expect professional quality however, I did expect to get all of the parts since I paid for them. Instead, it was missing the only crush washer that was supposed to be included as well as 2 support brackets for the backboard. We were still able to assemble it and make it work but I’d at least like to get all the parts I paid for. Will look elsewhere when it needs to be replaced, which I expect will be 1, maybe 2 seasons, max.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hoop
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of a pain to put together, but it was worth it. A year later, the hoop still looks new. My son really enjoys practicing with it. The black backboard (or whatever it's called) looks really nice compared to others I've seen. Moving it isn't too difficult since it has wheels, and raising or lowering it isn't that much of a chore. This was a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA, ship takes a bit longer and it’s worth the wait! Durable and height adjustable to kids or adult desire height. Husband is thrilled to receive as birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son's 8th birthday. I assembled all but the poles in my living room and was able to complete the assembly out of order because of the instruction quality (I did not need to use the video reference provided). My son and his friends have used it daily since he received it and several have asked their parents for one. Decent quality for the price and a great starter. Moves in and out of garage with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all the holes on the pole is even for screws to properly fit through.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I purchased this basketball goal for my son birthday but unfortunately we can’t assemble it due to the holes in the pile for the screw to go in are NOT EVEN! The holes are not even for the screw to go directly through it! I would like a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoop for the price. Overall a very good product, the only drawback is the directions say to use water or sand. We choose sand but the hole is so small it took and inordinate of time to fill-up. Just make the hole triple its current size.
customer_reviews.author: John in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with missing parts and was unable to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay griffis

customer_reviews.title: I recommend one not to purchase this
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop is made very cheap. It links and will break away from it backboard. I recommend one not to purchase this one

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible. Do not buy it. Pole was bent missing bolts and the backboard is super loose
customer_reviews.author: Mason VanMeter

customer_reviews.title: One of the best buys we have made
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. We bought it for them and they love playing we have not had a single issue with it. We filled it with water in case we have move it and so far the water is doing great. We check ever so often to see how much has evaporated and have only had to add a little great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alanya

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My teenage sons and I spent Christmas trying to put this together. The poles do not insert into each other, the holes do not align, and the instructions don't make sense. 4 of us spent hours trying to get this to work. I have a masters degree, yet this made me feel stupid. This product ruined our Christmas. I'd like to give it negative stars. My kids were so excited to get a basketball hoop that they ripped the box so I can't return it. $150 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Reilly, author

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: This was not hard to put together. My son and I did it in 30 min or so. We filled the bottom with water but left some space for expansion in the winter. Has held up to Iowa country winds on our farm and still looks great . We have had it since the end of May
customer_reviews.author: christine merten

customer_reviews.title: Good starter hoop
customer_reviews.text: Great starter basketball hoop and stand for kids or young adults. We ordered this as a Christmas gift and are very pleased with it thus far. It was fairly easy to assemble (although it does take two adults). We recommend using sand and not water in it because the sand makes it a little more stable.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Our item came without instructions on how to put it together. We had to google videos on how to put it together :-( If it were not for that, this would get a 5 star rating. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Weddell

customer_reviews.title: Not happy product fell over due to a slow leak I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy product fell over due to a slow leak I found in the base. So basically the water leaked out slowly over the course of a week which we just put it up 3 days ago, and a little wind came and it comes down. Thank goodness my cars were in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fair

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and as described. It's a bit difficult to put together with only 1 person but you can do it. I had another friend help me which made it much easier. Adjusting the height is not so easy or quick. If you plan on needing different heights, buy a hoop that has the quick height adjustment. Stable but when the basketball hits the backboard, it wiggles a bit but that is expected with a portable hoop. For the money, I'm satisfied. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This hoop seems great for the price. My elementary school kids really love it. I did assemble it by myself and almost couldn't. Attaching the backboard to the poll and hoop at the same time really is a 2 person job. Something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kerr

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE NIGHTMARE TO SET UP
customer_reviews.text: Not a two people job but a 3 person job. Screws and bolts that are not fit for purpose. Video instruction that do not match the same product. Too many pieces to bolt on. Multiple packs of screws. NIGHTMARE - Run keep scrolling away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible assembly
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy instructions are dated videos dated and a pain to put together
customer_reviews.author: KEESHA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality at a great price. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandey

customer_reviews.title: Great price for product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good product. We have had this now for a few months and my teen son and husband love it. We haven't had to move it or change the height on it, so I can't comment on how easy or not easy that would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: 15 3/4" metal rod missing
customer_reviews.text: As noted in another review, it's missing the 15 3/4" metal rod, which is a critical component, and we are unable to continue the assembly. I'm contacting Lifetime and hoping that they can send me the part as soon as possible. I'll update the review after completing the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: ZEO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids have loved having a hoop to play with while being quarantined. Shipped quickly. Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Reed

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my 9 year old son
customer_reviews.text: Liked the price and was pleasantly surprised when I received this product and saw how sturdy it was. My husband and I was able to put together this basketball hoop in like 2 hours. Not as bad as I thought. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandson's birthday
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to quality, etc because it was a gift shipped hundreds of miles from me. However, my grandson LOVES it and the videos of him playing along with adults and siblings indicates it must certainly be of acceptable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Idleman

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars . . .
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together but it is well made and looks beautiful. The kids are going to love it. Engineers could obviously have made it much easier to put it together and I would have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Craft

customer_reviews.title: No Tools Required?!
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy and very nice set up. The whole family loves it and I believe we will have many years of enjoyment out of it. HOWEVER..... In the description it says "No tools required" This is not true. Not true at all. It should state that you will not need any Allen wrenches. However, you will need two 1/2" box wrenches, and a piece of scrap wood to protect the rim and pole as you are maneuvering and banging things into place. Other than that, the set up is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: I like but..
customer_reviews.text: The price of someone assembling this for you via Amazon it’s like an extra hundred dollars basically and I think that it’s ridiculous because honestly if you bought this and you didn’t know what you were doing is going to be hard to put together so you’re gonna still have to pay somebody to do it but of course I would NOT suggest purchasing that assembly pack. It’s RIDICULOUS
customer_reviews.author: Keshia

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that worries is the backboard. I thought I over tightened the bolts but it appears I could have gone a bit tighter as it gives and moves when the ball hits it. It moves more than I expected anyway.
customer_reviews.author: sjamiso

customer_reviews.title: The enclosed instructions are terrible and extremely hard to understand.
customer_reviews.text: The enclosed instructions are terrible and extremely hard to understand. I used to work for the US government rewriting technical manuals into simple English so that mechanical engineers could understand them. We have never put anything together like this item. The instructions are only figures with no explanations. The figures also assume that you can identify nut and bolts sizes by sight or have an index tool to figure out the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Overall easy to build, design flaw. Leaky.
customer_reviews.text: Basketball court was given as a birthday gift. However; after I assembled the court(maybe 1.5 hours) and began filling base with water, I noticed a small leak. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: John.John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about 5 years, and still no problem. Durable enough for my two boys.
customer_reviews.author: NancyD.

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime 90040 EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I have 8, 12 and 16 year old boys. This is Great for them. One suggestion. If you plan on setting it up ad breaking it down seasonally, use water and not sand.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price and if you don’t need to change height.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Assembly instructions were very poor and marking on parts were not there at all. It took me extra efforts to redo things. 2. Can not reduce height as mentioned. Once bolts are in it’s hard to get out and reduce height.
customer_reviews.author: GARGA

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars! How hard is it to make sure all the pieces are there? Thanks alot, I now have 3 very disappointed kids! *The attached picture shows the missing parts. There are supposed to be 2 of each of the parts pictured. The slim piece attaches to the base to hold up the post & the wider piece holds the backboard to the post.
customer_reviews.author: No.1Key

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my neighbors son For all the helpful things he does for my family. His 13, but it together all by himself. Very sturdy Built with good quality material

customer_reviews.title: dont buy unless you have a contractor to put it together
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together, need more than one person to do that. Even that not all holes corresponds with screws. The manual is long like a Russian novel, confusing, and not very effective. I would never purchased this product if I knew what it would cost me to put it together.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it. Now he has a REAL hoop.

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as other ones - but also not as expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoop for the price. I purchased for an 8 year old so we did not need a $300 hoop. This is great and will last for a few summers at least.
customer_reviews.author: Flower219

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Didn't come with directions to put it together but we found it easily on their website.
customer_reviews.author: NicciTod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product it exactly what I needed and as described. Service was excellent

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The height adjusts but it is a pain in the butt. I recommend leaving this at the height you want it from assembly. Try to have a couple people help just to hold things while putting together. Great hoop. Best price for its functionality. I have played intensely on this thing and it does it all! Just don’t hang from the rim and you will be fine. We filled ours with 250lbs of sand and you could probably fit 300lbs in the container. Solid hoop
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Took a long time to assemble, but great hoop for our backyard once it’s done!
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 people 2-3 hours to assemble. But once it’s done, it’s worth it as my kids LOVE it. It’s the perfect size for my 8-10 yr old boys.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Great price ...great deal!
customer_reviews.text: The portable hoop was delivered promptly. Easy setup and made a budding basketball player very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Skurulsky Jr.

customer_reviews.title: return
customer_reviews.text: Is that possible to put all parts back inside the package? The height adjustable seems to doesn't fit into the box. I just wanna to return because it's too tall for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: RandomNerdDad

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Holds up nice and the weather been outside for three years in the sun and snow and still look good
customer_reviews.author: Gators2060

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions explicitly.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (14 years old) and I put it together in 2 hours. Must be very precise in following the directions explicitly. Do not completely tighten any bolts until directions say to do so. We had to backtrack one time, but it only added a few extra minutes. I am going to use sand instead of water in the base. Looks like that will be somewhat difficult because of the small fill hole.

customer_reviews.text: Entry level basketball net, bit of a challenge to assemble and does not seem very sturdy, but works for 9y/o 1st net.

customer_reviews.text: For the money ok. Backboard is dead unless you hit the square right in the middle. For driveway shooting it does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a goal for our 10 yo son. I was floored by some of the prices, then I found this one. It is sturdy and perfect for our driveway. We've had a few strong storms here since and the wind hasn't been an issue. We like the adjustable height option, but haven't really used it.
